result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Quill Running Buffalo Hawk

records.addlTxt:
OFF RECORD 11:30 AM Defendant Quill Running Buffalo Hawk in court.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Quill Running Buffalo Hawk.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Chapman asks for a reset, State has no objection. Court resets Status Conference.
Status conference scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on January 3, 2023 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Quill Running Buffalo Hawk
Current: 9390 Water Street, Hayward, WI 54843 United States  (Effective: 03-10-2022)
Prior: 1336 Smith St, Green Bay, WI 54302

2:48 PM Defendant Quill Running Buffalo Hawk appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman not in court.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. Court indicates DEF has completed treatment at Magnolia Ranch and returned to Sawyer County Jail, as bond stated.  DEF makes statement regarding future plans, employment, and follow up treatment.  2:51 PM  OFF THE RECORD:  Attny Chapman joining meeting.   2:51 PM  BACK ON THE RECORD.  Court brings Attny Chapman up to speed on hearing.  Discussion follows.  Court addresses Justice Point Representative, H. Lessard, as to requirements of Justice Point with DEF.    Court amends all bonds and sets new bond   SIBS $15,000  COMBINED BOND  22CF9 and 22CF45 ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.

DEF updates address and telephone number.
Bail/bond hearing on June 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:11AM Defendant Quill Running Buffalo Hawk appeared by video, from Magnolia Ranch, with Attorney Daniel James Chapman appearing in person.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case (22CF09, 22CF76, 22CF45, 22CV06) and recites appearances. All parties have discussion on Atty Chapman's appointment in all cases.  Parties agree Atty Chapman will be counsel in all cases.  Atty Chapman indicates ARGN needed in 22CF45.  Atty Chapman acknowledges information, waives reading, enters NG plea on behalf of DEF.  Court enters NG plea.  Atty Chapman requests reset. 

OFF THE RECORD / 11:13AM - for scheduling.  Court sets STC on 10/11/22 at 11AM.  Court has discussion with DEF on progress and future programming.
Status conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.

2:31 PM Defendant Quill Running Buffalo Hawk in court in court, in custody, appears by video.  Attorney Daniel Chapman appears by video.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   
Attny Chapman makes bond modification request.   Court addresses Mark Stone in Gallery.  Court indicates bond will be modified to SIBS when bed is available at Magolia Ranch.    Court grants furlough for assessment at Bizhiki Wellness Center date to be determined.   DEF to be released to MARK STONER for transport to and from assessment.    
When dates are set, Mark Stoner, to be in contact with Attny Chapman.   Clerk to notify Chapman, an order will need to be filed.
Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on June 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:45 PM Defendant Quill Running Buffalo Hawk appeared by video, in custody.  Attny Daniel Chapman (special appearance) in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.   Attny Chapman makes statement regarding MN warrants.
Status conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on May 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Washington County Order of Revocation and Warrant
